attributes.title: Worthless
attributes.review: This app is terrible. Very glitchy, tons of fake news, huge disappointment.

attributes.title: Omg no. This is a terrible app.
attributes.review: This app destroyed my crops, set fire to my face, and set tornados on my roof. It is dysfunctional and ineffective just like the administration that this app is for. 0/10 I do not recommend.

attributes.title: Abhorrent
attributes.review: I downloaded it and it has awful interface and a racist. If I could give it negative stars I would.

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: this app is so horrific, there was an old and almost .. orange..? pig ? in all the pictures ? i was very confused, especially since i didn’t think pigs wore wigs ,,

attributes.title: I’m blind
attributes.review: I currently blind because of your foundation have you ever thought of changing the shade I remember right before I went blind my eyes turned or- orange🤭

attributes.title: HORIBBLE
attributes.review: This app makes u get haunted. I see trump every night. I have to go to therapy now and am traumatized for the rest of my life. If u want to avoid this, don’t get this app😭

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: When I first got this app it was fine but then it started glitching and my phone shut off and the next thing I knew my pet Siegel was GONE😭😭THIS APP ATE MY SIEGEL!!!💔💔😭so if u love and want to keep you’re Siegel safe..DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP😭😭😭💔😭💔💔💔😭💔💔RIP 🕊

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: If I could give this a zero I would. This whole app is full of propaganda and fake news. I am shocked that this is what is allowed on the App Store. And utter disgrace.

attributes.title: lol
attributes.review: this app is horrible it doesn’t let me walk my pet fish and that gets me mad bc she need oxygen. i don’t want her to drown in the water. anyways it’s a waste of time DO NOT GET IT

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: Do not get this app. I opened it and it was an old white man asking for my number would not recommend.
